title: Join us at an event to have your say in our current consultations
authors: Nicola Lewellen, Programme Engagement and Communications lead
categories: North Sea and Channel sprat FMP
Southern North Sea and Channel skates and rays FMP
Southern North Sea demersal non-quota FMP

content.text: The first week of our fisheries management plans (FMPs) consultation events is drawing to a close with events held in Lowestoft on Tuesday (sprat) and Carnforth today (cockle).
We will be coming to locations across England over the next few weeks to talk about the drafts and get your views on the following plans
North Sea and Channel sprat FMP
Southern North Sea and Channel skates and rays FMP
Southern North Sea demersal non-quota FMP
Find out details for all the events here Fisheries Management Plans events | Eventbrite
We will be announcing online events soon, so subscribe to the blog to be the first to know about them.
